Stem: Young stems covered in fine curled hairs, older stems hairless and greyish-brown.
Leaves: Crowded close together, alternately arranged, oval or egg shaped with smooth edges up to 4 cm long.
Flowers: Pink or purple and pea-like, with wings, central keel-like structure is more white.
FruitSeeds: Capsule, flattened and circular to 1 cm diameter, green ageing to brown. 2 hairy black seeds per capsule.
DistinguishingFeatures: Distinctive from all but hybrid cultivated varieties.
